title: I'm a genius - I just fixed Kha'Zix
body:
Make Q a skillshot like Rengar's. It'd still be very difficult to miss, but at least it can be outplayed. Basically, it'd be very similar to Rengar's rework . 

The crazy synergy Kha'Zix has with middle tree is just too insane. This simple change will give people a fighting - albeit slim - chance.

replies.body: so instead of single target spell which he needs vision to use it would be an instant aoe high damage spell which he can check bushes using? Great idea.
AOE, no way. Just straight line single target. Ez's Q-like.
And when you say "skillshot like rengar" everyone on the boards would agree that they see it as an aoe damage spell, with maybe even 2 procs
Oh so just make him useless full stop then.
